title: I am tired of being discredited for my work I put in as Zyra.

replies.body: I mean, you shouldn't be looking for confirmation from others to know you carried your teammonkeys hard.

> [{quoted}](name=Snapp2Kill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PhKeE8AF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-25T01:08:59.246+0000)
>
> I mean, you shouldn't be looking for confirmation from others to know you carried your teammonkeys hard.

Yeah - it just gets SO old when people type crap discrediting the job I did at the end of the game.

As a support this is kind of expected tho, people will always try and say "you got yo ass carried" no matter how many teammates you got fed, how many plays you set up, or how many deaths you prevented.

the most apparent form of carrying is the most obvious, which would be the 21/0 zed that you made sure didn't die after diving.
They should just revert her q nerf cuz this killed her

> [{quoted}](name=Step Sis Lux,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PhKeE8AF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-25T01:26:27.130+0000)
>
> They should just revert her q nerf cuz this killed her

Oh trust me, I actually have a whole twitter account I use to remind Riot every single day. https://twitter.com/1337n312dc0d3

Lol.
gotta love this riot, we are waiting for ages for like syndra lissandra od zyra buffs but they buffed zed rengar and nocturne like 3 or 4 patches in a row  XD
When you play Zyra and brag about dealing a shit ton of damage
